backend/main.mo: Defines the backend canister with user profiles, wellness data types, storage mixins, and admin‑restricted queries for retrieving user information.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence records describing landing page branding updates and asset usage with metadata for tests and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short summaries of key frontend files including pages, components, and assets used across the React app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining global OKLCH-based color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template setting page metadata and loading the React application entrypoint.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component controlling authentication, onboarding, routing, and the display of the welcome tutorial.
frontend/src/components/DebtManagement.t: UI component for adding, editing, deleting, and tracking debt records with payment history and progress visualization.
frontend/src/components/MedicationManage: UI component for managing medications, including CRUD operations and adherence logging with notes.
A modal tutorial component introducing SHAMMAH with feature highlights and branding.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, including login, logout, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for user profile, onboarding, photos, and other backend interactions using the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base theme defining wellness‑themed colors, dark mode variables, global styles, and custom scrollbars.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Dashboard UI with sidebar navigation that switches between wellness pages and handles logout via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/pages/dashboard/JournalPage: Journal interface allowing users to create entries via a dialog and view existing entries from their profile.
frontend/src/pages/dashboard/Mindfulness: Mindfulness activity logger where users record activity type and duration and view accumulated minutes.
frontend/src/pages/dashboard/OverviewPag: Dashboard overview summarizing overall wellness progress, pillar progress, and recent journal and mindfulness activity.
Renders detailed content for a selected wellness pillar, including trackers, activity logging, and reward handling using user profile data.
frontend/src/pages/dashboard/QuizPage.ts: Implements a multi‑step wellness quiz, saving answers and showing a completion summary once all questions are answered.
frontend/src/pages/dashboard/ResourcesPa: Displays categorized wellness resources such as videos, ebooks, and guides using static mock data.
frontend/src/pages/dashboard/RewardsPage: Shows user points, badges, and earned rewards, separating achieved and in‑progress items.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page with branding, hero content, and sign‑in actions using Internet Identity and placeholder OAuth options.
frontend/src/pages/OnboardingFlow.tsx: Two‑step onboarding that uploads a baseline photo and collects quiz responses before marking onboarding complete.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileSetup.tsx: Profile creation form that submits a new user’s email and display name.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project state describing current wellness app features, branding updates, architectural notes, known issues, and a list of existing and pending feature requests.
